projects.title: Partify
projects.subtitle: A Collaborative Playlist Generator
projects.description: Have you ever tried to create a playlist for a group of friends? Partify was my solution to that problem. It's a web app that connects to Spotify's API to analyze the musical tastes of multiple users and automatically generates a new playlist everyone can enjoy. The app's core feature predated 'Spotify Blend,' a similar tool the company later introduced to their official platform.

projects.title: ICY (I Choose You)
projects.subtitle: A Pokémon Battler Using Deep Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: I trained an AI to master Pokémon battles using Deep Reinforcement Learning. By implementing a Deep Q-Network (DQN) and a curriculum learning strategy my agent achieved a 90% win rate against a tough, rule-based model.
